snippet: Tina Maze won her fourth straight giant slalom race Sunday to extend her overall World Cup lead and, more important, increase her advantage over Lindsey Vonn.
abstract: Skier Tina Maze of Slovenia wins her fourth straight giant slalom race to extend her overall World Cup lead and, more important, increase her advantage over American Lindsey Vonn; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tina Maze won her fourth straight giant slalom race Sunday to extend her overall World Cup lead and, more important, increase her advantage over Lindsey Vonn.
